text: midneun salamdeul-i yeonhalgun-eul bo ass-eul ttae geudeul-i malhagil igeos-eun ha nanimgwa geubun-ui seonjijakkeseo yagsoghan geos-igeoneul hananimgwa geubun-ui seonjija neun mueos-i jinsil-ingaleul muliege malsseumhasyeossdoda ilihayeo geudeul-e geneun sin-angsim-i deohaejigo sunjongham-i deohayeo jyeossdeola
